channel.title: winterfest – North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies
channel.description: Better nannying for North Carolina starts here!

image.title: winterfest – North Carolina Professional Association of Nannies

item.title: Winterfest + All Members Meeting 2020
item.dc:creator: NC PAN Webmaster
item.description: It is once again time for NC PAN members to make their voices heard during our annual All Members meeting. This year, we are being generously hosted in the Zoom of one of our Agency Affiliates. You must be RSVPed as “going” to receive the joining information. If you don’t have a Facebook account, send […]
item.content:encoded:
It is once again time for NC PAN members to make their voices heard during our annual All Members meeting. This year, we are being generously hosted in the Zoom of one of our Agency Affiliates. You must be RSVPed as “going” to receive the joining information. If you don’t have a Facebook account, send an email to winterfest2020@ncpan.org with your yes-RSVP and we’ll send you the information via email.

Our holiday gathering for nannies and those they love, this year, will be on December 19th from 5:30 to 9 pm.

All Members Meeting, limited to supporting members, will begin at 5:30 pm, promptly, as we have a lot to cover. Reports will be given by all of the board members, and your feedback will be solicited. How do you want NC PAN to serve you in 2021?

Following that meeting, from 5:45 pm to 6 pm is the awarding of the earned memberships to those who went above and beyond in this pandemic. If you have someone to nominate, you have until the 17th of December to nominate them for inclusion in this award ceremony. Read about that award, here. Anyone is invited to attend and cheer for these Superstar Nannies.

And finally from 6-9 pm will be a party for EVERYONE: nanny, nanny-adjacent, or just a nanny-supporter!

Here is a brief outline of the schedule:
6 – 7 pm: Agency Affiliate party hour; there will be prizes!
7 – 9 pm: Nanny movie with a drinking game (water, naturally) to make sure we all stay hydrated.
9 pm: Goodbyes.

So join us to retire 2020 in grand, nanny-budget-friendly fashion while we welcome 2021 with eager anticipation of it fulfilling your needs!

RSVP HERE for WinterFest.

item.title: WinterFest Zoom Collaboration Needed (Agency Affiliates)
item.dc:creator: NC PAN Webmaster
item.description: Greetings Agency Affiliates! We are hoping to collaborate with one of you to throw our annual WinterFest holiday bash (and All Members Meeting). If you have a paid Zoom where we can have meetings of unlimited time and are willing to donate that access to us for an evening (of your choice), please send an […]
item.content:encoded:
Greetings Agency Affiliates! We are hoping to collaborate with one of you to throw our annual WinterFest holiday bash (and All Members Meeting).

If you have a paid Zoom where we can have meetings of unlimited time and are willing to donate that access to us for an evening (of your choice), please send an email to social@ncpan.org.

In return, you will get as much or as little publicity by name as you want, as well as programming control for one hour and fifteen minutes of the WinterFest celebration. The schedule will be as follows:

5:30 pm (15 minutes) All Members Meeting in a breakout room for members / Your choice of programming in the main room.
5:45 pm (15 minutes) Awards ceremony. Breakout rooms closed.
6 pm (1 hour) Your programming.
7 pm (2 hours) Nanny movie.

We will offer you gratis memberships and discounts to the Equipment Shop to give out as awards if you choose to do games during your programming.

Once again, please do get in touch with social@ncpan.org if this sounds like a collaboration you are interested in.

If you are unfamiliar with what our WinterFest celebrations are like, we encourage you to read about past WinterFests.

item.title: Winterfest + All Members Meeting 2018
item.dc:creator: NC PAN Webmaster
item.description: It is once again time for NC PAN members to make their voices heard during our annual All Members meeting. This year, we are making it easier than ever for all members to attend, by hosting a Google Hangout! The link to the Hangout will be emailed to all NC PAN members. All Members Meeting will […]
item.content:encoded:
It is once again time for NC PAN members to make their voices heard during our annual All Members meeting. This year, we are making it easier than ever for all members to attend, by hosting a Google Hangout! The link to the Hangout will be emailed to all NC PAN members. All Members Meeting will begin at 7 pm on December 15th, promptly, as we have a lot to cover. Reports will be given by all of the board members, and your feedback will be solicited. How do you want NC PAN to serve you in 2019?

Our holiday gathering for nannies and those they love, this year, will be combining with the Triangle Nanny Tribe’s holiday party in Raleigh on December 8th. They’ll send out the address the week of the party to those who are coming! Feel free to bring food or drink to share but heavy apps will be provided! White elephant gift exchange: everyone please bring a $20 gift WRAPPED.

For our out of town members, we have arranged for a free night (Friday) in this AirBNB space. Contact homestay@ncpan.org for further information. While this offer is limited to four out of town member nannies, additional local-to-Raleigh and local-to-Durham member nannies may open their guest rooms. Contacting homestay@ncpan.org puts you in the know!

So join us to retire 2018 in grand, nanny-budget-friendly fashion while we welcome 2019 with eager anticipation of it fulfilling our needs!

RSVP HERE for the holiday party.

item.title: Make an Overnight of It!
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Levenbook
item.description: Due to the wintery weather, the date for the December Triad Nanny Walk and Breakfast had to be moved to come just a scant few hours after Winterfest and the All Member’s Meeting. And it is only an hour’s drive away, with local nannies offering homestays for out of towners. So, hey, out of towners! […]
item.content:encoded:
Due to the wintery weather, the date for the December Triad Nanny Walk and Breakfast had to be moved to come just a scant few hours after Winterfest and the All Member’s Meeting. And it is only an hour’s drive away, with local nannies offering homestays for out of towners.

So, hey, out of towners! Yes you! Make a nanny socialization overnight of it!

First, come to Winterfest and the All Member’s Meeting, then stay the night in the area, and head home via the Nanny Breakfast and Walk to complete an excellent time socializing.

Click these links for more details and to RSVP so we know you are coming!

Winterfest and All Member’s Meeting

Triad Nanny Breakfast and Walk

Free Homestay

item.title: Winterfest + All Members Meeting 2017
item.dc:creator: NC PAN Webmaster
item.description: It is once again time for NC PAN members to make their voices heard during our annual All Members meeting. This year, we are being generously hosted in the home of our Social Chair, Nanny Laura. All Members Meeting will begin at 7 pm on December 15th, promptly, as we have a lot to cover. […]
item.content:encoded:
It is once again time for NC PAN members to make their voices heard during our annual All Members meeting. This year, we are being generously hosted in the home of our Social Chair, Nanny Laura.

All Members Meeting will begin at 7 pm on December 15th, promptly, as we have a lot to cover. Reports will be given by all of the board members, and your feedback will be solicited. How do you want NC PAN to serve you in 2018?

Following that meeting, from 7:15 to 10 pm is a potluck Winterfest holiday gathering for nannies and those they love. THe theme this year is Icelandic Christmas Eve. Bring a new, or gently used book and chocolate, if you are so inspired for a cozy exchange! In addition, bring your favorite holiday dish to share!

We know nannies are always on a budget, so we want to make this event fun, festive, and wallet friendly.

For our out of town members, we have arranged for a free night (Friday) in this AirBNB space. Contact homestay@ncpan.org for further information. While this offer is limited to four out of town member nannies, additional local-to-Raleigh and local-to-Durham member nannies may open their guest rooms. Contacting homestay@ncpan.org puts you in the know!

So join us to retire 2017 in grand, nanny-budget-friendly fashion while we welcome 2018 with eager anticipation of it fulfilling our needs!

RSVP HERE for the All Members Meeting, Winterfest, or both.

item.title: Winterfest + All Members Meeting 2016
item.dc:creator: NC PAN Webmaster
item.description: It is once again time for NC PAN members to make their voices heard during our annual All Members meeting. This year, thanks to a generous location sponsorship from The Nest, a Raleigh CoWorking/Remote Working/Startup Office space (Would you enjoy your work-from-home employers being out of the house? A day pass is only $15!), we […]
item.content:encoded:
It is once again time for NC PAN members to make their voices heard during our annual All Members meeting. This year, thanks to a generous location sponsorship from The Nest, a Raleigh CoWorking/Remote Working/Startup Office space (Would you enjoy your work-from-home employers being out of the house? A day pass is only $15!), we will be hosting both our All Members Meeting and Winterfest at The Nest’s beautiful Aerie.

All Members Meeting will begin at 6 pm, promptly, as we have a lot to cover. Reports will be given by all of the board members, and your feedback will be solicited. How do you want NC PAN to serve you in 2017?

Following that meeting, from 7 to 10 pm is a potluck Winterfest holiday gathering for nannies and those they love. Bring a gift valued at $10 for a wild Dirty Santa! Previous gifts have included fake poop, a year’s supply of hand sanitizer, and a wine glass that has been able to hold a whole bottle of wine, just to orient you to the types of gifts that are exchanged. In addition, bring your favorite holiday dish to share!

We know nannies are always on a budget, so we want to make this event fun, festive, and wallet friendly.

For our out of town members, we have arranged for two free nights (Friday and Saturday) in this AirBNB space. Contact homestay@ncpan.org for further information. While this offer is limited to four out of town member nannies, additional local-to-Raleigh member nannies may open their guest rooms. Contacting homestay@ncpan.org puts you in the know!

So join us to retire 2016 in grand, nanny-budget-friendly fashion while we welcome 2017 with eager anticipation of it fulfilling our needs!

RSVP HERE for the All Members Meeting, Winterfest, both, or to have a virtual presence by joining the livestream.
